title: Kanraku Alpha: Enigma - Dai-4 no Verse
original_name: 陥落アルファ ―エニグマ
sinopse:
Tsukasa Kuga is the heir to a great company. One day, at a party, he meets a man who appears to be the heir to the Amou empire. Tsukasa intends to use this man for his own gain, but without realizing it he is already underneath him in his bed!

(Source: Futurecomics, translated)
